      • getInstance

      • setToolView

        public void setToolView​(ActionBarView v,
                        boolean endTool)
        Provided an ActionBarView, show the tool as embedded and with an x to close the tool.
        Parameters:
        v - the action bar view to show.
        endTool - Whether to send out an UNSET_TOOLBAR (end tool) intent when v is null

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Description copied from interface: Disposable
        Releases all resources associated with the Object. The Object should not be used following an invocation of this method and any usage will result in undefined and possible application ending behavior.
        Specified by:
        dispose in interface Disposable

        Grabs the user defined string color from settings See: CustomActionBarFragment
        Returns:
        int Color object

      • getActionBarColor

        public int getActionBarColor()
        Finds the selected saved color value from the preferences parses the color and apply a 99% alpha to allow for transparency under the action bar if parsing fails , default original action bar is used
        Returns:
        int Color to be used for the action bar

      • onNavButtonsVisible

        public void onNavButtonsVisible​(boolean visible)
        Description copied from interface: NavButtonsVisibilityListener
        Called when the top-left nav buttons have been turned on or off
        Specified by:
        onNavButtonsVisible in interface NavButtonsVisibilityListener
        Parameters:
        visible - True if buttons visible
